messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Samurai Hats and Helmets
messages.msgSnippet: Arms and Armour of the Samurai by Bottomley and Hopson has several different forms of helmet. I have a large collection of photos of the Helmets that are on
messages.messageBody:
Arms and Armour of the Samurai by Bottomley and Hopson
has several different forms of helmet.

I have a large collection of photos of the Helmets
that are on display and some that are int eh stares at
the Royal armouries in Leeds if they will help

Paul


--- Scott19NY <scottc_4@...> wrote:

<HR>
<html><body>


<tt>
Mark, <BR>
<BR>
There is a book entitled SECRETS OF THE SAMURAI by
Ratti and <BR>
Westbrook.  It has several pictures, and
information about various <BR>
forms of head gear worn by the samurai.  Good
luck in your search.<BR>
<BR>
</tt>

messages.subject: Samurai Hats and Helmets
messages.msgSnippet: Mark, There is a book entitled SECRETS OF THE SAMURAI by Ratti and Westbrook.  It has several pictures, and information about various forms of head gear worn
messages.messageBody:
Mark,

There is a book entitled SECRETS OF THE SAMURAI by Ratti and
Westbrook. It has several pictures, and information about various
forms of head gear worn by the samurai. Good luck in your search.
